resources.string: Light text with transparent widgets (and some other widget improvements), modernization of the main forecast screen, cancellable notifications, link directly to Environment Canada\'s 24-hour forecast, many bugfixes, updated sitelist from Environment Canada, and much more!\n\nFor those keeping track, Environment Canada has been very good to me over the past year, and I\'ve successfully defended an M.Sc. in Geology. Thanks for all your kind emails and bug reports and feature requests (many of which ended up in this update). As always, keep it coming to apps@fishandwhistle.net.
